snippet: A grand jury investigating whether other laws were broken in connection with the rape of a 16-year-old girl by two high school football players last year has issued its first indictment.
abstract: Grand jury investigating whether other laws were broken in connection with rape of 16-year-old girl by two Steubenville, Ohio, high school football players issues its first indictment; charges school employee William Rhinaman with interfering with criminal matter.
lead_paragraph: A grand jury investigating whether other laws were broken in connection with the rape of a 16-year-old girl by two high school football players last year has issued its first indictment.

headline.main: Ohio: School Aide Faces Charges Linked to Rape Case
headline.print_headline: Ohio: School Aide Faces Charges Linked To Rape Case
